the_entry_ticket: The entry ticket does more than just grant access—it actively generates yield, which grows into the final rewards for the top competitors.
participants_earn: Participants earn points by actively using specific protocols within the Kujira ecosystem. The more you engage with the designated protocol, the more points you accumulate.
at_the_end: At the end of the league, top scorers win prizes from the generated pool, while all participants reclaim their full entry ticket and gain valuable experience and ecosystem engagement, ensuring everyone benefits regardless of their ranking.
invite_friends: Invite friends to join Axion and earn rewards together! Every friend you bring boosts your earnings—no limits, just endless possibilities.
you_can_join: You can join as a participant or donator
registration_as_participant: Registration as a participant is closed. You can still make a donation for those competitions.
